content.description: Understanding and using recursion to solve problems. (2017 Fall, Midterm 2 Version B, Question 4)

p.line: If we change the bottom-right expression coins to _BOLDS_all-but-first-of(coins)_BOLDE_, What would be computed?
report the same value as before
report what'd happen if we never used the first coin
report what'd happen if we always used the first coin
report what'd happen if each coin could only be used once

content.hint: It would report what’d happen if each coin could only be used once, since on that recursive call you’re both using a coin (amount – item 1 of coin) and not using it again (coin becomes all but first of coin).
